methods.name: Account.session
methods.summary: Used by a distributor to push Session token to firebolt.

methods.name: Account.onRequestSession
methods.summary: Registers as a provider for when device needs a session

code.title: errorObjectCode
code.description: A Number that indicates the error type that occurred. This MUST be an integer. The error codes from and including -32768 to -32000 are reserved for pre-defined errors. These pre-defined errors SHOULD be assumed to be returned from any JSON-RPC api.

message.title: errorObjectMessage
message.description: A String providing a short description of the error. The message SHOULD be limited to a concise single sentence.

data.title: errorObjectData
data.description: A Primitive or Structured value that contains additional information about the error. This may be omitted. The value of this member is defined by the Server (e.g. detailed error information, nested errors etc.).

result.name: session
result.summary: The request to get a new session

methods.name: DeveloperTools.find

methods.name: DeveloperTools.unpair
methods.summary: Disconnect Firebolt as a web socket client from the web socket that corresponds to the given developer tool ID

params.name: id

methods.name: Privacy.allowResumePoints
methods.summary: Whether the user allows resume points for content to show in the main experience

methods.name: Privacy.allowUnentitledResumePoints
methods.summary: Whether the user allows resume points for content from unentitled providers to show in the main experience

methods.name: Privacy.allowWatchHistory
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their watch history from all sources to show in the main experience

methods.name: Privacy.allowProductAnalytics
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their usage data can be used for analytics about the product

methods.name: Privacy.allowPersonalization
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their usage data to be used for personalization and recommendations

methods.name: Privacy.allowUnentitledPersonalization
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their usage data to be used for personalization and recommendations for unentitled content

methods.name: Privacy.allowRemoteDiagnostics
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their personal data to be included in diagnostic telemetry. This also allows whether device logs can be remotely accessed from the client device

methods.name: Privacy.allowPrimaryContentAdTargeting
methods.summary: Whether the user allows ads to be targeted to the user while watching content in the primary experience

methods.name: Privacy.allowPrimaryBrowseAdTargeting
methods.summary: Whether the user allows ads to be targeted to the user while browsing in the primary experience

methods.name: Privacy.allowAppContentAdTargeting
methods.summary: Whether the user allows ads to be targeted to the user while watching content in apps

methods.name: Privacy.allowACRCollection
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their automatic content recognition data to be collected

methods.name: Privacy.allowCameraAnalytics
methods.summary: Whether the user allows data from their camera to be used for Product Analytics

methods.name: Privacy.settings
methods.summary: Gets the allowed value for all privacy settings

methods.name: Privacy.onAllowResumePointsChanged
methods.summary: Whether the user allows resume points for content to show in the main experience

methods.summary: Whether the user allows their usage data can be used for analytics about the product

methods.summary: Whether the user allows their usage data to be used for personalization and recommendations

methods.name: Privacy.onAllowUnentitledPersonalizationChanged
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their usage data to be used for personalization and recommendations for unentitled content

methods.name: Privacy.onAllowRemoteDiagnosticsChanged
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their personal data to be included in diagnostic telemetry. This also allows whether device logs can be remotely accessed from the client device

methods.name: Privacy.onAllowPrimaryContentAdTargetingChanged
methods.summary: Whether the user allows ads to be targeted to the user while watching content in the primary experience

methods.name: Privacy.onAllowPrimaryBrowseAdTargetingChanged
methods.summary: Whether the user allows ads to be targeted to the user while browsing in the primary experience

methods.name: Privacy.onAllowAppContentAdTargetingChanged
methods.summary: Whether the user allows ads to be targeted to the user while watching content in apps

methods.name: Privacy.onAllowACRCollectionChanged
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their automatic content recognition data to be collected

methods.name: Privacy.onAllowCameraAnalyticsChanged
methods.summary: Whether the user allows data from their camera to be used for Product Analytics

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowResumePoints
methods.summary: Whether the user allows resume points for content to show in the main experience

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowUnentitledResumePoints
methods.summary: Whether the user allows resume points for content from unentitled providers to show in the main experience

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowWatchHistory
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their watch history from all sources to show in the main experience

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowProductAnalytics
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their usage data can be used for analytics about the product

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowPersonalization
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their usage data to be used for personalization and recommendations

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowUnentitledPersonalization
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their usage data to be used for personalization and recommendations for unentitled content

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowRemoteDiagnostics
methods.summary: Whether the user allows their personal data to be included in diagnostic telemetry. This also allows whether device logs can be remotely accessed from the client device

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowPrimaryContentAdTargeting
methods.summary: Whether the user allows ads to be targeted to the user while watching content in the primary experience

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowPrimaryBrowseAdTargeting
methods.summary: Whether the user allows ads to be targeted to the user while browsing in the primary experience

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowAppContentAdTargeting
methods.summary: Whether the user allows ads to be targeted to the user while watching content in apps

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowACRCollection

methods.name: Privacy.setAllowCameraAnalytics

methods.name: UserGrants.app
methods.summary: Get all granted and denied user grants for the given app

result.name: info
result.summary: The list of grants for this app

methods.name: UserGrants.device
methods.summary: Get all granted and denied user grants for the device

result.name: info
result.summary: The list of grants for the device

methods.name: UserGrants.capability
methods.summary: Get all granted and denied user grants for the given capability

result.name: info
result.summary: The list of grants associated with the given capability

methods.name: UserGrants.grant
methods.summary: Grants a given capability to a specific app, if appropriate. Calling this results in a persisted active grant that lasts for the duration of the grant policy lifespan.

methods.name: UserGrants.deny
methods.summary: Denies a given capability, to a specific app if appropriate. Calling this results in a persisted Denied Grant that lasts for the duration of the Grant Policy lifespan.

methods.name: UserGrants.clear
methods.summary: Clears the grant for a given capability, to a specific app if appropriate. Calling this results in a persisted Denied Grant that lasts for the duration of the Grant Policy lifespan.

methods.name: UserGrants.request
methods.summary: Requests Firebolt to carry out a set of user grants for a given application such that the user grant provider is notified or an existing user grant is reused.

result.name: info
result.summary: The result of all grants requested by this

methods.name: VoiceGuidance.enabled
methods.summary: Whether or not voice-guidance is enabled.

methods.name: VoiceGuidance.speed
methods.summary: The speed at which voice guidance speech will be read back to the user.

methods.name: VoiceGuidance.onEnabledChanged
methods.summary: Whether or not voice-guidance is enabled.

methods.name: VoiceGuidance.onSpeedChanged
methods.summary: The speed at which voice guidance speech will be read back to the user.

methods.name: VoiceGuidance.setEnabled
methods.summary: Whether or not voice-guidance is enabled.

methods.name: VoiceGuidance.setSpeed
methods.summary: The speed at which voice guidance speech will be read back to the user.

methods.name: Wifi.scan
methods.summary: Scan available wifi networks in the location.

result.name: list
result.summary: Contains a list of wifi networks available near the device.

methods.name: Wifi.connect
methods.summary: Connect the device to the specified SSID.

params.name: ssid
params.description: Name of Wifi SSID to connect for the device.

params.name: passphrase
params.description: Password or Passphrase for the wifi.

result.name: connectedWifi
result.summary: Successful Response after connecting to the Wifi.

examples.name: Connect to a wpa2Psk Wifi with password
Connect to a WPA2 PSK Wifi with password

methods.name: Wifi.disconnect
methods.summary: Disconnect the device if connected via WIFI.

methods.name: Wifi.wps
methods.summary: Connect to WPS

result.name: connectedWifi
result.summary: Successful Response after connecting to the Wifi.

examples.name: Connect to a WPS Wifi router

enabled.description: Whether or not voice guidance should be enabled by default

speed.description: The speed at which voice guidance speech will be read back to the user

enabled.description: Whether or not closed-captions should be enabled by default

ClosedCaptionsStyles.title: ClosedCaptionsStyles
ClosedCaptionsStyles.description: The default styles to use when displaying closed-captions

AccessoryList.title: AccessoryList
AccessoryList.description: Contains a list of Accessories paired to the device.

AccessoryPairingTimeout.title: AccessoryPairingTimeout
AccessoryPairingTimeout.description: Defines the timeout in seconds. If the threshold for timeout is passed without a result it will throw an error.

AccessoryType.title: AccessoryType
AccessoryType.description: Type of the device Remote,Speaker or Other

AccessoryTypeListParam.title: AccessoryTypeListParam
AccessoryTypeListParam.description: Type of the device Remote,Speaker or Other

AccessoryProtocol.title: AccessoryProtocol
AccessoryProtocol.description: Mechanism to connect the accessory to the device

AccessoryProtocolListParam.title: AccessoryProtocolListParam
AccessoryProtocolListParam.description: Mechanism to connect the accessory to the device

make.description: Name of the manufacturer of the accessory

Token.description: Encoded token provided by the Distributor for Device Authentication.

Expiry.description: Number of secs before the token expires

correlationId.description: The id that was passed in to the event that triggered a provider method to be called

result.description: The result of the provider response.

id.description: The id of the app that requested the challenge

name.description: The name of the app that requested the challenge

capability.description: The capability that is being requested by the user to approve

requestor.description: The identity of which app is requesting access to this capability

parameters.description: The request to challenge the user

granted.description: Whether the user approved or denied the challenge

correlationId.description: The id that was passed in to the event that triggered a provider method to be called

parameters.description: The result of the provider response.

Capability.description: A Capability is a discrete unit of functionality that a Firebolt device might be able to perform.

Permission.title: Permission
Permission.description: A Capability combined with a Role, which an app may be permitted (by a distributor) or granted (by an end user).

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Role provides access level for the app for a given capability.

id.description: The ID that uniquely identifies this instance of a developer tool

name.description: Developer-visible 'friendly name' for the developer tool

NavigationIntent.title: NavigationIntent
NavigationIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate to a specific place in an app.

ProgramType.title: ProgramType
ProgramType.description: In the case of a program `entityType`, specifies the program type.

HomeIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to it's home screen, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
HomeIntent.title: HomeIntent

LaunchIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to launch an app.
LaunchIntent.title: LaunchIntent

EntityIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to a specific entity page, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
EntityIntent.title: EntityIntent

PlaybackIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to a the video player for a specific, playable entity, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
PlaybackIntent.title: PlaybackIntent

SearchIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to it's search UI with a search term populated, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
SearchIntent.title: SearchIntent

SectionIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to navigate an app to a section not covered by `home`, `entity`, `player`, or `search`, and bring that app to the foreground if needed.
SectionIntent.title: SectionIntent

TuneIntent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention to 'tune' to a traditional over-the-air broadcast, or an OTT Stream from an OTT or vMVPD App.
TuneIntent.title: TuneIntent

options.description: The options property of the data property MUST have only one of the following fields.

assetId.description: The ID of a specific 'listing', as scoped by the target App's ID-space, which the App should begin playback from.

restartCurrentProgram.description: Denotes that the App should start playback at the most recent program boundary, rather than 'live.'

time.description: ISO 8601 Date/Time where the App should begin playback from.

Intent.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a user intention.

allOf.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a Movie entity.
allOf.title: MovieEntity

allOf.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a TV Episode entity.
allOf.title: TVEpisodeEntity

allOf.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a TV Series entity.

TVSeasonEntity.title: TVSeasonEntity
TVSeasonEntity.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of a TV Season entity.

allOf.description: A Firebolt compliant representation of the remaining entity types.
A Firebolt compliant representation of the remaining entity types.

entityId.description: ID of the channel, in the target App's scope.

message.description: The message to display to the user so the user knows what they are entering

correlationId.description: An id to correlate the provider response with this request

parameters.description: The request to start a keyboard session

text.description: The text the user entered into the keyboard

canceled.description: Whether the user canceled entering text before they were finished typing on the keyboard

intent.description: The navigation intent to launch the app with

url.description: The url that the app will be launched with

title.description: The display title of the app

catalog.description: The catalog id that this app's content metadata comes from

runtime.description: Information about the runtime that the application is running in

transport.description: The type of transport the application container will use to communicate to Firebolt

launch.description: Launch information for this app that will be loaded

intent.description: The firebolt navigation intent that this app will be loaded with

secondScreen.description: Any information about the app being launched from a second screen

SecondScreenEvent.title: SecondScreenEvent
SecondScreenEvent.description: An a message notification from a second screen device

pinSpace.description: The pin space that this challenge is for

capability.description: The capability that is gated by a pin challenge

requestor.description: The identity of which app is requesting access to this capability

parameters.description: The request to challenge the user

ResultReason.title: ResultReason
ResultReason.description: The reason for the result of challenging the user

granted.description: Whether the user succeeded in the pin challenge

GrantInfo.description: Information about a grant given by a user

AppInfo.description: Information about an app that a grant was for

GrantState.description: The state the grant is in

AccessPointList.title: AccessPointList
AccessPointList.description: List of scanned Wifi networks available near the device.

WifiSignalStrength.title: WifiSignalStrength
WifiSignalStrength.description: Strength of Wifi signal, value is negative based on RSSI specification.

WifiFrequency.title: WifiFrequency
WifiFrequency.description: Wifi Frequency in Ghz, example 2.4Ghz and 5Ghz.

AccessPoint.title: AccessPoint
AccessPoint.description: Properties of a scanned wifi list item.

WPSSecurityPin.title: WPSSecurityPin
WPSSecurityPin.description: Security pin type for WPS(Wifi Protected Setup).

Timeout.title: Timeout
Timeout.description: Defines the timeout in seconds. If the threshold for timeout is passed for any operation without a result it will throw an error.
